args:
tshark -l -i any -f 'tcp' -T fields \
-e frame.time_epoch -e ip.proto -e ip.src -e ip.dst \
-e tcp.srcport -e tcp.dstport -e frame.len -e tcp.len \
-e tcp.flags.fin -e tcp.flags.syn -e tcp.flags.reset \
-e tcp.flags.push -e tcp.flags.ack -e tcp.flags.urg \
-e tcp.flags.cwr -e tcp.flags.ece -e tcp.window_size_value \
-e tcp.hdr_len -E header=y -E separator=, > /data/flows_raw.csv
containers.name: monitor

waiting.message: Container image "local/ids-agent:latest" is not present with pull policy of Never
